评论概述: ROOMY WITH A LOT OF POCKET OPTIONS
评论详情: Cute, fashionable bag with a lot of pocket options. I didn't really like it as a backpack because the straps kept slipping off my shoulders and it didn't feel secure on my back so I used it as a handbag instead. The jean material was a bit flimsy for heavier items (i.e., bottled water), but it worked fine for everyday items like keys, glasses and my ear pods. Good value for the reasonable price.
